title: Epic 5: Ledger Storage
description: Read/write entries to notes, find latest entry. Prerequisites: Epic 2, Epic 3. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 7: Log Command
description: The primary command - record work as ledger entry. Prerequisites: Epic 5, Epic 6. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 8: Show Command
description: Display a single entry by ID or --last. Prerequisites: Epic 5. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 10: Export Command
description: Export entries for pipeline consumption. Prerequisites: Epic 5. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 13: Notes Subcommands
description: Notes management for syncing (init/push/fetch/status). Prerequisites: Epic 2. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 0: Foundation Infrastructure
description: Minimal CLI that builds, tests, lints, and handles output correctly. Prerequisites: none. See docs/roadmap.md for details.
close_reason: All foundation tasks complete: Cobra root, --json flag, output package, exit codes

title: Set up Cobra root command with version/help
description: Create the basic CLI structure using Cobra. Add root command, version flag, help formatting.

title: Add --json global flag infrastructure
description: Add --json persistent flag to root command. Create pattern for passing flag down to subcommands.

title: Create internal/output package
description: Implement output helpers: JSON output, human output with lipgloss, TTY detection, structured errors with code/message/hint.

title: Define exit code constants and wire through Cobra
description: Define ExitOK=0, ExitUserError=1, ExitSystemError=2, ExitConflict=3. Wire into Cobra error handling.

title: Epic 2: Git Notes Layer
description: Read/write JSON entries to refs/notes/timbers. Prerequisites: Epic 1. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 12: Skill Command
description: Self-documentation for building agent skills. No prerequisites. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 3: Entry Schema
description: Type-safe entry struct with validation and ID generation. Prerequisites: Epic 0. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 6: Pending Command
description: Show undocumented commits - the clear next action command. Prerequisites: Epic 5. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 14: Auto and Batch Modes
description: Efficiency features for high-volume documentation. Prerequisites: Epic 7. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 15: Polish and Integration
description: Production readiness - help text, integration tests, documentation. Prerequisites: All prior epics. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 9: Query Command
description: Search and retrieve entries (M1 scope: --last N only). Prerequisites: Epic 5. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 11: Prime Command
description: Context injection for session bootstrapping. Prerequisites: Epic 4, Epic 6, Epic 9. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 1: Git Operations Layer
description: Reliable git operations via exec with proper error handling. Prerequisites: Epic 0. See docs/roadmap.md

title: Epic 4: Status Command
description: First working command - shows repo and notes state. Prerequisites: Epic 1, Epic 2. See docs/roadmap.md
